short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate Chrome extension for smarter relationship management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi-Hey: Your All-in-One AI Assistant for Job Seekers, Sales, PR, Communications, and Teams

Hi-Hey is a powerful, free Chrome extension crafted to boost outreach for individuals and teams in job seeking, sales, PR, and communications. With Hi-Hey, you can leverage AI to personalize messaging, improve engagement, and connect with your audience seamlessly across platforms—whether you’re working solo or collaborating within a team.

Features:

AI-Powered Personalization: Tailor messages that align with your goals, be it for job hunting, client outreach, or media engagement.
Team Collaboration: Consistent messaging across team members, so everyone can maintain brand voice and quality in their outreach.
Multi-Platform Flexibility: Connect on LinkedIn, email, job boards, and more with ease.
Quality Assurance in Every Interaction: Ensure all communications are polished, on-brand, and impactful.
Hi-Hey empowers both individuals and teams to amplify their outreach efforts. Whether you're seeking new career opportunities, driving sales, or managing public relations, Hi-Hey takes your connections and communication to the next level—all at no cost.
